segments.text: I'm checking out now . Can I have my bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What's your room number , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 8736 . Here is my key card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A minute , please . It's 6212 yuan all together . Tax included .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I pay with traveler's check ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Can I have your passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Are you satisfied with your stay here with us , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very much . The room is cozy and the service is jolly good . By the way , could you deliver my luggage to the airport in advance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It will be taken care of , sir . Which flight do you take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Flight 17 . And my luggage should be delivered there by 4 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Got it , sir . It'd be great to see you again , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
